mapper.select: select portfolio.uid as uid, skill, GROUP_CONCAT(tag_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS tag from portfolio join portfolio_tag on portfolio.uid = portfolio_tag.portfolio_uid GROUP BY portfolio_uid;

select portfolio.uid as uid, skill, GROUP_CONCAT(tag_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS tag from ( select portfolio.uid, skill from bookmark join portfolio on bookmark.mark_uid = portfolio.uid where user_info_uid = #{uid}) as portfolio join portfolio_tag on portfolio.uid = portfolio_tag.portfolio_uid GROUP BY portfolio_uid;
